creator: jcobleig@cs.umass.edu
text:
In the optional task ANTLR, the glib option can be used to specify a
supergrammar to a subgrammar.  If this supergrammar is specified and changes,
the subgrammar should be regenerated.  Currently, if the supergrammar changes,
the subgrammar does not get regenerated.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: should be fixed with nightly build 2003-04-02.
